about_the_game: Virtual Reality for imos AG means not only technology, but also a modern visualization tool for sketching planning results, created with imos software. How imos technology can be integrated into the sales process as playfully, but nevertheless sales-promoting, it can also be integrated into the sales process, imos AG shows for the first time in the so-called "VR LOFT". The visitors are invited to take a look at the virtual experience and to marvel at the new possibilities.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: not neccessary
  • VR Support: SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: You can always run it on a slower cpu or cheaper gpu, but you will probably experience some kind of slowdown.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel™ Core™ i5-4590 or AMD FX™ 8350, equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce™ GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 480, equivalent or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: not neccessary
  • Additional Notes: You can always run it on a slower cpu or cheaper gpu, but you will probably experience some kind of slowdown.

short_description: Immerse yourself in the world of virtual reality with imos and test the possibilities for yourself. Show playfully, kinematics of fittings or change live the colors and sizes of kitchen fronts, for example.
